str2: From, away from. A primary particle; 'off, ' i.e. Away, in various senses.
Blood, literally, figuratively or specially; by implication, bloodshed, also kindred.
Abel, second son of Adam and Eve, brother of Cain. Of Hebrew origin; Abel, the son of Adam.
A conjunction, preposition and adverb of continuance, until.
Blood, literally, figuratively or specially; by implication, bloodshed, also kindred.
Of Hebrew origin; Zacharias, the name of two Israelites.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Middle - Genitive Masculine Singular
str2: From apo and the base of olethros; to destroy fully, literally or figuratively.
Meanwhile, afterwards, between. From meta and a form of sun; betwixt; as adjective, intervening, or adjoining.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
An altar (for sacrifice). From a derivative of thusia; a place of sacrifice, i.e. An altar.
And, even, also, namely.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A dwelling; by implication, a family.
Yes, certainly, even so. A primary particle of strong affirmation; yes.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.

word: [ all of ] it will be charged
parse: Verb - Future Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To seek out, seek out after, require. From ek and zeteo; to search out, i.e.investigate, crave, demand, worship.
From, away from. A primary particle; 'off, ' i.e. Away, in various senses.
This; he, she, it.
From genos; a generation; by implication, an age.
